mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.sjh AS "sjh", a.unionid AS "unionid", a.yhtx AS "yhtx", a.sfz AS "sfz", a.xm AS "xm", a.xb AS "xb", a.mz AS "mz", a.csrq AS "csrq", a.yx AS "yx", a.zcsj AS "zcsj", a.fssj AS "fssj", a.yzm AS "yzm", a.prov AS "prov", a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area", a.dlzh AS "dlzh", a.dlzhsj AS "dlzhsj", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.yh_dlzh AS "yhDlzh", a.yh_dlmm AS "yhDlmm", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_yhxx( owid, sjh, unionid, yhtx, sfz, xm, xb, mz, csrq, yx, zcsj, fssj, yzm, prov, city, area, dlzh, dlzhsj, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, yh_dlzh, yh_dlmm, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{sjh}, #{unionid}, #{yhtx}, #{sfz}, #{xm}, #{xb}, #{mz}, #{csrq}, #{yx}, #{zcsj}, #{fssj}, #{yzm}, #{prov}, #{city}, #{area}, #{dlzh}, #{dlzhsj}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{yhDlzh}, #{yhDlmm}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET owid = #{owid}, sjh = #{sjh}, unionid = #{unionid}, yhtx = #{yhtx}, sfz = #{sfz}, xm = #{xm}, xb = #{xb}, mz = #{mz}, csrq = #{csrq}, yx = #{yx}, zcsj = #{zcsj}, fssj = #{fssj}, yzm = #{yzm}, prov = #{prov}, city = #{city}, area = #{area}, dlzh = #{dlzh}, dlzhsj = #{dlzhsj}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, yh_dlzh = #{yhDlzh}, yh_dlmm = #{yhDlmm}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT a.OWID as "owid" ,a.YHTX as "yhtx", a.SJH as "sjh",b.OLX as "olx" ,b.XSXM as "xsxm" ,b.XSXH as "xsxh", a.YH_DLZH as "yhDlzh" , a.YH_DLMM as "yhDlmm" FROM bckj_biz_yhxx a ,bckj_biz_yhkz b WHERE a.`OWID`=b.`YH_REF_OWID` AND a.`YH_DLZH`=#{yhDlzh};
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_yhxx SET YH_DLMM=#{yhDlmm} where OWID=#{owid};
update bckj_biz_yhxx set dlzhsj=now() where owid = #{value}
